channel.title: IP Problem
channel.description:
I have been trying to solve this problem for almost a week now. Whenever I set my client to my ip address, it doesn't connect to my server, but when I set it to 127.0.0.1, it works, but I want other people to be able to connect to my server too. So how do I get it so I can set my client to my ip and then let others download it.
I dunno if this makes sense or not, but thank you.

item.title: IP Problem
item.dc:creator: @dantotman dantotman
item.description:
@dantotman wrote:

have your portforward? have you make a no-ip?

Read full topic

item.title: IP Problem
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Try using a client in which you can alter the connecting IP on demand. Make sure you can actually log into your server using the IP you’re using in that client.

Read full topic
